区块链今日热点：你的 DAO 已经有了一个操作系统

我们都熟悉计算机操作系统（OS），它是用户和计算机之间的接口。一个充满漏洞或设计不良的操作系统会带来糟糕的用户体验，并使一个原本非常强大的工具变得毫无用处。

组织也有操作系统。组织操作系统决定了人们在组织内一起工作的方式，以及该组织将如何运作。就像在计算机操作系统中一样，组织操作系统中的漏洞会造整个系统不起作用，激化团队冲突，并破坏社区的氛围。

在 DAO 中，你可能对「运营」一词十分熟悉，但一个有效的操作系统所包含的内容要素远不止有「运营」。DAO 运营是你的操作系统的一部分，但它不是你操作系统的全部。操作系统是指整个系统，是允许 DAO 成员在其组织中有效工作并实现目的的协调层。

title: Uma análise sobre: Algoritmos De Consenso e a ShapeShift DAO
body:
**Olá FOXes!**
Bem-vindos a mais um artigo de nossa coluna semanal com análises profundas sobre o universo cripto. Hoje, falaremos sobre as diferenças os principais mecanismos asseguram a validadade das informações nas blockchains **e a importância da ShapeShift DAO nesse ecossistema.**

## A Arte Milenar de Minerar Bitcoins

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jMMFbyjIsP4klKdx9nOHv.png?height=480&width=900)

O Bitcoin, a criptomoeda concebida por Satoshi Nakamoto que deu origem a um mercado de U$1.33T após 13 anos de sua criação, inaugurou o uso da Prova de Trabalho ou Proof of Work para manutenção da segurança da blockchain, uma rede responsável por interligar milhares de máquinas, também chamadas nós. Estes, operam em conjunto visando inserir e validar blocos na *chain,* em troca de recompensas em BTC.

Para certificar a veracidade das informações incluídas em novos blocos da blockchain e garantir a veracidade dos dados inseridos por outros nós, é usada a Prova de Trabalho, o algoritmo de consenso do Bitcoin. Seu funcionamento resume-se a um quebra cabeça algorítmico.

Todos os nós da rede participam da corrida pela solução do problema matemático gerado pela blockchain do Bitcoin, até que o ganhador seja recompensado com uma quantidade específica de novos bitcoins por conseguir resolvê-lo e pode validar blocos da rede. Desde sua concepção, a blockchain do BTC vem diminuindo os incentivos aos validadores, fenômeno intitulado como *halving.*

Deste modo, a Prova de Trabalho é o algoritmo utilizado para certificar que houve um gasto energético e computacional para validar as transações na blockchain. Satoshi desenvolveu este mecanismo para proteger a blockchain do Bitcoin. Com o PoW, agentes com intenção de usar seu poder computacional para fraudar informações da rede, verão os custos sobreporem-se aos lucros por agir de má-fé, conduzindo-os a lucrar contribuindo com a segurança da rede.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Zw_o7Wqw0InLAsLQ3CXdQ.png?height=425&width=602)

Com a escalada de preços do BTC na última década, o número de interessados em tornar-se um nó da blockchain do Bitcoin aumentou exponencialmente. Atraídos pelos rendimentos obtidos com a atividade e cientes da escassez da criptomoeda, empresas tem dispendido milhões de dólares na aquisição de máquinas profissionais para extrair o máximo de bitcoins possíveis.

Devido à entrada massiva de companhias no setor, computadores pessoais tornaram-se inviáveis para minerar bitcoin. Além disso, a discussão sobre o impacto ambiental das mineradoras é constantemente levantado pela mídia, apesar de as fontes de energia usadas pelos nós serem, majoritariamente, renováveis.

Em paralelo à expansão da Prova de Trabalho do Bitcoin, o número de blockchains Proof of Stake cresceram nos últimos anos, com Ethereum, Avalanche, Fantom e tantas outras adotando este algoritmo de consenso, cada uma com sua peculiaridade.

Para entender o porquê da criação de um novo mecanismo de segurança para *chains,* **explicaremos a você primeiramente como ele funciona.**

## Alocação de Recursos Para Garantir a Segurança e o Proof of Stake

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R-tG0ff31iE-SOOJIOUkh.png?height=620&width=930)

O *Proof of Stake, PoS* ou simplesmente Prova de Participação é um algoritmo de consenso baseado na seleção pseudo-aleatório de validadores presentes na rede. Estes, para serem elegíveis ao recebimento de recompensas e contribuírem com a segurança da rede, necessitam realizar o *stake* de criptomoedas. Quanto maior o número de nós e ativos na blockchains, mais descentralizada e segura será. Neste modelo de consenso, os blocos não são minerados, mas sim construídos pelos selecionados pelo algoritmo para fazê-lo.

Esta seleção pode usar requisitos que variarão a depender do projeto, mas costumam elencar validadores a partir do capital em *stake* e a quanto tempo atua como validador. Esses dois requisitos normalmente são usados em conjunto, visando minar monopólios na validação de blocos nos nós com alta quantidade de tokens em *stake,* o que colocaria em risco a segurança da rede.

Comparativamente com a Proof of Work, o PoS não demanda o uso de força computacional para validar novos blocos: aqui, é necessário somente uma máquina contendo uma *wallet* com o número de tokens necessários para ser um nó. Na Ethereum, por exemplo, é de 32 ETH.

Apesar de parecer inviável pessoas comuns contribuírem com a segurança de *chains* devido à necessidade do capital investido, no Proof of Stake quaisquer interessados em receber recompensas e ajudar a redes a validar novas transações podem fazê-lo através da delegação de tokens.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/E-6MEsA-wpAscya06sR9Q.png?height=768&width=1024)

Essa opção democratiza o acesso ao recebimento de incentivos por usuários sem condições de investir em caros equipamentos, necessários para conseguir receber retornos financeiros palpáveis no Proof of Work. Deste modo, blockchains com esse algoritmo de consenso introduzem novos usuários a sua rede com maior facilidade, escalando sua segurança rapidamente a medida que novos validadores e delegadores surgem, interessados nos incentivos distribuídos por garantir a segurança da *chain.*

Uma fator essencial ao escolher um nó para delegar seus tokens é a qualidade do serviço prestado por ele a rede. Blockchains *Proof of Stake* possuem mecanismos que punem validadores por exercerem suas funções com má-qualidade. Ações como manter-se *offline* por mais de 2 horas ou atentar contra a resiliência da rede - inserção de blocos com dados falsos ou ataques de 51% - acarretam punições, a depender de sua gravidade. Os delegadores a este nó de má-fé são igualmente afetados, podendo ter até mesmo seus tokens perdidos.

Por isso, a escolha de uma nó para delegar realizar o *stake* de seu capital é essencial para não preocupar-se com a perda de seus ativos.

## ShapeShift: Assegurando a Resiliência do Universo DeFi

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZNHWb-jOUbselIF6yTQlP.png?height=900&width=1800)

A ShapeShift DAO está presente **em mais de 8 blockchains *Proof of Stake* contribuindo com a segurança de cada uma delas e provendo aos usuários a capacidade de obter recompensas delegando seus tokens ao validador da organização**.

Graças a parceria de sucesso com a TaxiStake, conseguimos expandir nossas operações a múltiplas *chains* baseados no SDK da Cosmos e evoluir nosso *know how* sobre o funcionamento das redes.

Visando otimizar os incentivos recebidos pela atividade, nossos desenvolvedores [criaram uma ferramenta nativa ShapeShift DAO](https://ibc.foxfrens.com/umee) para realizar o *auto-compound* diário dos tokens recebidos, aumentando em até 3x as recompensas recebidas pelo *stake.*

Recentemente, a ShapeShift DAO iniciou a operação de seu validador da Terra2, [clique aqui e saiba mais sobre!](https://station.terra.money/stake/terravaloper1xvcllwusyx7pf539es7f8dsdnffmur6xz32lm7#delegate)

Esta foi nossa análise semanal, explicando a você os conceitos dos principais algoritmos de consenso do universo cripto e participação da ShapeShift DAO na segurança das *chains* IBC espalhada no mundo das Finanças Descentralizadas.

Tem dúvidas quanto ao funcionamento dos validadores da ShapeShift? Ou sobre como delegar seus tokens a DAO?

Traga-as para o nosso [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/shapeshift), [Telegram](https://t.me/shapeshiftdaoBR) e/ou [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ShapeShiftDAOBR) e vamos falar sobre eles!

***Autor: [guiriba](https://guilhermebarbosa.substack.com/), copywriter no LatAm Labs da ShapeShift, pesquisador e degen. Escreve, a priori, sobre DeFi, NFTs e DAOs.***

逐仓保证金：各个仓位的保证金独立计算，盈亏单独核算。适合有金融衍生品经验的用户，以及追求高杠杆用户。

杠杆倍数有10倍和20倍可选。

计价单位有USD和CNY可选。

交易单位有张和BTC可选，每一张合约代表100USD。

## 合约类型

目前提供周合约、次周合约、季度合约三种。如果不是做超短线的话，建议选择季度合约，操作上比较灵活。

区块链今日热点：主权 Rollup

Rollup 类别中的最后两个目前是理论上的，尽管正在积极开发中。主权 Rollup 与典型的 Rollup 不同，因为它有一个分叉选择规则，允许它独立于其基础层分叉。相反，常规 Rollup 将其分叉选择委托给其结算层——它必须是结算层，因为它需要确保 Rollup 的正确性。

主权 rollups 将在 Celestia 等数据可用性（DA）层上最为突出，其中 DA 层无法确保 Rollup 事务的正确性。正因为如此，像 Celestia 这样的东西的 Rollup 默认是主权的，因为它们必须通过欺诈/有效性证明和分叉选择来确保自己的交易正确性。这不应被误认为是 Celestia 提供的共识，用于就交易排序达成一致。

对于一个乐观的主权 Rollup，假设交易是正确的，因此 Rollup 节点只需要从 Celestia 下载区块数据。Zk - 主权 rollup 通过有效性证明确保正确性，该证明将通过 p2 p 网络分布在 rollup 节点之间。

对我来说，主权 Rollup 的重要性在于它们的分叉能力，这使这些 Rollup 能够真正独立于其基础层。从本质上讲，主权 Rollup 重新获得了社会追索机制。

## 结算 Rollup

结算 Rollup 是一种专为结算而构建的主权 Rollup。重要的是，结算层是任何具有双向信任最小化桥梁和 Rollup 的区块链。该桥使代币能够在 Rollup 层和结算层之间双向传输。信任最小化是桥梁的一个属性，其中通信仅依赖于通过验证数据可用性和欺诈/有效性证明的诚实少数假设。

与任何结算层一样，结算 Rollup 的目的是为“Rollup”提供一个环境，以验证证明、解决争议和桥接代币。不过，从技术上讲，结算之上的“Rollup”是混合的，因为它们通过结算 Rollup 所在的数据可用性层使用链下 DA——使它们成为一种 validum 或一种 Optimistic validium。

## 混合 Rollup

### 有效的

说到混合，validium 就是一种混合 zk-rollup，其中交易数据发布在链下，这可能需要除用于验证有效性证明的结算层之外的任何环境。StarkEx 是唯一的有效实例。特别是，StarkEx 是一个特定于应用程序的验证，目前支持三个应用程序；Immutable X、Sorare 和 DeversiFi。StarkEx 还支持 DyDx 使用的 zk-rollup 模式，这是 TVL 第二大的 Rollup。

StarkEx 使用由一组受信任方组成的数据可用性委员会 (DAC) 为 StarkEx 验证提供数据可用性。虽然将数据可用性委托给获得许可的委员会会降低安全性，但它使 StarkEx 验证能够提供比 zk-rollups 更便宜的交易。成本降低是可能的，因为将数据发布到以太坊是昂贵的——它也是导致 Rollup 交易费用的主要可变成本。

使用外部数据可用性层可以减少带有 DAC 的验证的一些安全考虑。安全性的主要增加来自区块链提供的加密经济安全性，节点可能因不诚实活动而被监禁和惩罚。该实施的一种 Validium 是对“Rollup”范围内成本安全权衡的一个有趣的补充。

区块链今日热点：自 2019 年出世以来，Rollups 已经走过了漫长的道路。我们已经看到形成了两个主要竞争者阵营，以及包含许多混合演化的其他各种有前途的 Rollup 理论设计。**2022 年已经过半，我们现在来看看 Rollup 生态系统的发展现状。**

## Optimistic Rollup

由于通用 Optimistic Rollup 的主网上线使用时间明显长于其 zk-rollup 同行，因此它们获得了绝大多数 rollup 应用程序。两个领先的 Optimistic Rollup 应用是 Arbitrum 和 Optimism，一段时间以来一直如此。

根据 TVL 衡量，Arbitrum 排名最高，达到 24 亿美元。尽管在主网上运行了一年的大部分时间，但系统上仍处于训练测试阶段。目前，开发 Arbitrum 的实体 Offchain Labs 运营着一个单一的中心化排序器。虽然交互式欺诈证明是实时的，但单个排序器是唯一可以提交争议以生成欺诈证明的白名单实体。从用户的角度来看，他们仍然必须对系统有很大的信任，尽管预计会逐步走向去中心化。

Arbitrum 下一个协议升级 Nitro 已在开发网络上运行，并将彻底改革现有架构，用 WASM-Geth 组合替换自定义的 Arbitrum 虚拟机。Arbitrum 的交互式欺诈证明将在 WASM 上运行，并且节点软件将具有与 Geth 等效的代码库，以及一些特定于 Rollup 的优化。总而言之，Nitro 将带来显着的优化、更高的性能和更好的 EVM 兼容性。

Optimism 是第二大 Optimistic Rollup，在所有 Rollup 的 TVL 排名中位居第三，为 4.69 亿美元。Optimism PBC 的情况与 Arbitrum 的情况类似，只有一个中心化排序器。然而，Optimism PBC 找到了一种方法，通过使用从排序器获得的利润来追溯资助公共产品，从而为网络提供积极的利益。第一轮共向 58 个公益项目捐款 100 万美元。如果有任何方法可以在中心化排序的情况下产生积极影响，那么这不失为一条可以走的道路。

目前，Optimism 缺乏欺诈证明，但预计会逐步去中心化和必要的安全升级——这也是标准。但是，几乎所有 Rollup 都具有即时或延迟升级能力，因此 Rollup 的安全性最终取决于升级多重签名。

即将到来的 Bedrock 升级将把 Optimism 的架构转变为类似于 Arbitrium 的架构。当前的 Optimism 虚拟机将被 MIPS-Geth 组合取代，其中节点软件等同于常规的以太坊 Geth 节点——这被称为以太坊等效。交互式欺诈证明也将作为附加功能，这是对原始非交互式欺诈证明的升级。一般来说，Bedrock 将是 Optimism 的重要一步，为系统添加了许多功能和增强功能。

顺便说一句，Optimism 也向非富豪治理实验迈出了一大步。决策将在两个屋子之间进行，即代币屋和公民屋。代币屋将采用通用代币投票，而公民屋将采用一个公民一票制。由此看来，这样一个系统中最困难的障碍可能是找到为用户分配公民身份的最佳方法，同时最大限度地减少女巫攻击的可能性。如果用户可以获得多个公民身份，那么他们可以有效地对治理施加比普通公民更大的影响力。Optimism 指出，他们将使用不可转让的 NFT 来代表公民身份，但是个人交换私钥以获得更多选票的威胁仍然存在。

Fuel 是 Optimsitic Rollup 领域的另一个著名参与者，它采取了与 Arbitrum 和 Optimism 截然不同的方法。Fuel Labs 正在使用基于 rust 的编程语言为 Fuel V2 构建自定义 VM。虽然与 EVM 兼容的 Rollup 对于将以太坊开发生态系统加入 Rollup 特别有用，但自定义 VM 是可以获得最大性能提升的地方，因为它们不必遵守现有的标准。

Fuel V2 中我最喜欢的部分可能是并行事务处理，主要是因为一旦出现足够的数据容量，吞吐量瓶颈就会变成执行。一旦吞吐量瓶颈转移到执行，实现并行处理的 Rollup 将比没有它的 Rollup 有优势。值得注意的是，Fuel V1 是第一个在以太坊上上线的主网 Optimistic Rollup，并且仍然是唯一一个存在无需许可的排序器和欺诈纠纷以及没有升级多重签名的 Rollup。

区块链今日热点：是什么造就了一个好的操作系统？

每个组织都有一种协调其组织功能的方式，这其实就是该组织的操作系统。只是他们可能意识不到这个操作系统具体是什么，或者它是如何创建的。最有可能的是，操作系统是在一系列决策和程序的基础上随着时间的推移而出现的，与组织的使命和价值观一起实施。通常，没有人能够清楚地说明该操作系统是如何形成的，但使用操作系统的人们都知道这个操作系统的存在，因为大家通常都会说「这就是我们在这里做事的方式」。

我们可以利用计算机操作系统的经验来理解组织操作系统。**是什么造就了一个好的计算机操作系统：**

安全性高

用户友好

可资源共享

便于访问

多任务处理

一个功能性的 DAO 操作系统将包括类似的元素。操作系统给组织成员的体验应该是直观且易于交互的，尤其是会提高新成员在刚开始工作时所需的知识和信心。这个系统应该是安全的，例如具有抵抗胁迫或攻击的治理机制。这个系统应该是开放的、透明的、无权限的，允许资源共享且便于使用的。这个系统还应该是灵活和自适应的，以满足许多用户和团队长期以来不断变化的需求。

**一个糟糕的计算机操作系统有哪些迹象：**

高成本（组织和技术债务）

不可靠的

复杂的

碎片化的

容易受到攻击的

结合你现在正在参与建设的 DAO。你有看到坏的操作系统的迹象吗？这些 DAO 的治理看起来支离破碎吗？新成员是否抱怨感到迷茫？如果 DAO 有很多组织债务，如果过时的结构或政策到 DAO 的生产力和文化降低（那么又会发生什么呢？坏操作系统的影响很容易说明：

文化会受到影响。效率会受到影响。人会受到影响。

文化受到创伤，效率受到损伤，人员受到影响

–Sarah Starrenburg

DAO 提供了一个改变我们工作方式的机会，但如果它们要成为工作的未来，我们需要升级我们的组织方式。我们需要一个新的操作系统。

### 进化型（TEAL）组织

译者注：Teal – 指导隐喻是生物系统。这些是目标驱动的组织，目的改革进化, 成员控制组识靠的是自我管理。不需要靠等级或共识。

虽然 DAO 是一种新兴的组织结构，但它们实际上与所谓的进化型组织或 Teal 组织共享很多核心要素。传统的组织是等级制的，倾向于以利润为导向。进化型组织更像活的系统或超级有机体，倾向于以目的为导向。

「我认为这就是 DAO 的魅力所在。它们是不断进化的。如果它停止进化，我就不叫它 DAO 了。

我已经开始把它称为有机体与组织。我认为这反映了 DAO 的流动性和它通过成员的参与来适应的能力。」

title: Welcome to Crypto Besties
body:
**Hey Besties, it’s been a minute, so we just wanted to re-introduce ourselves.**

Crypto Besties began as a community dedicated to lowering the barrier of entry, learning more about the crypto ecosystem, and looking at the financial system in a new way. **Best Friends are non-judgemental, accepting, and fun**, and that’s the type of space we wanted to create within our community, to onboard more women and under-represented groups into crypto. We hosted virtual and IRL meetups, produced educational content, started a job board, and are hosting a virtual job fair, we want to become a hub to meet like-minded individuals, make new friends, and learn together.

Over time we were seeing more and more crypto-curious members joining our community, but we recognized there was a gap in incentives and ownership opportunities for our non-crypto-native friends. With the rise of incentivized communities, DAOs, and utility NFTs we believe there’s a potential to bridge this gap through shared interests. **This inspired us to launch the first digital-physical makeup collective**, where beauty lovers would have the opportunity to craft, create, and curate beauty products and experiences.

**MAKEUP FOR YOU BY YOU.** 💄✨

### The Opportunity:

*Women & Crypto*

More than two-thirds of US cryptocurrency investors are men, and about 60% are white.

*Women & Consumer*

Women direct 83% of all consumption in the United States, in buying power and influence.

*Women & The Beauty Industry*

$Besties token holders, those who participated in our Mirror crowdfund (link_) and hold the Crypto Besties Governance token, and impactful contributors to the Crypto Besties community were given the ability to vote on what product we released, and it’s name, design, and color.

### Our Future Roadmap:

* Crypto Besties will continue to design in-house makeup/beauty products
* Crypto Besties will explore more integration of the digital and physical landscape of the makeup/beauty worlds
* Crypto Besties will work with other communities and influencers to produce makeup/beauty products using co-creation

title: HASH DAO Whitepaper
body:
**Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture ($HASH)**

**The World‘s First Cannabis DAO**

*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission**  

To cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution for craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOC communities interested in the cannabis space.

HASH DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's to create the world’s first DAO cannabis company and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAO Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem**

Funding for a successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal quality creates struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

*Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space*

**Solution**

Merging Web3 technologies with the cannabis space and creating decentralized and democratized opportunities for companies to raise capital.

HASH DAO : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

**Introduction**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering it’s boom phase as support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) grows and global cannabis markets continue to come online. The cannabis space is estimated to grow to over [$200 Billion by 2030](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220203005879/en/Global-Cannabis-Market-Size-Forecast-Report-2021-A-176-Billion-by-2030---Growing-Legalization-of-Medical-Cannabis-in-Various-Countries-Driving-Growth---ResearchAndMarkets.com--) as predicted by Berkshire Hathaway. The majority of the craft cannabis industry, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the consumer, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly penalized small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in. Certain strains go on to become culturally iconic that generate massive value. Often times the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Current Stakeholders in the Cannabis Space :

* Breeders, Growers, & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**How it Works**

Create community-ownership of the vertically-integrated HASH DAO supply chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. 

Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKU’s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

**Data Privacy & Security** 

Privacy is essential to any business. Surprisingly, it is almost nonexistent in the blockchain ecosystem. For example, Bitcoin started out with privacy as a goal but was subverted and now is very public by using [chain analytics companies](https://bitcoinist.com/yes-your-bitcoin-transactions-can-be-tracked-and-here-are-the-companies that-are-doing-it/.). 

It's like having your bank account available to the public where the public cannot access your money but they can see everything you are doing. The same is true of smart contract platforms like Ethereum. 

Hash DAO will use the most private smart contract platform currently soon-to-be available, [DERO](https://www.dero.com/). 

Bitcoin's privacy problem was solved by the cryptocurrency coin Monero; similarly, Ethereum’s privacy problem is solved by the token DERO. 

Many blockchain projects, both cryptocurrency coins and and smart contract platforms using tokens, claim privacy but in fact are not. They offer a privacy option at best. This in fact defeats true privacy which only exists when the project offers *privacy by default at the protocol level*.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**World’s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

**HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : 

HASH DAO is an organization that is dedicated to creating a network of cannabis growers and educators. We aim to promote the use of horticulture, farming and natural medicine as a means for collective healing and wellness. A cannabis research, development and production partnership. This DAO will address both the intellectual property and craft standards of local microgrowers, processors, home growers and people interested in horticultural education as well as providing funding for research projects into genetic diversity and marijuana's medicinal applications.

Another utility is that HASH DAO is a tokenized equity fundraising tool. HASH DAO's mission is to become a community-governed organization tasked with helping small companies fund themselves and achieve liquidity. A decentralized community-governance solution for HASH DAO that includes a market-driven, tokenized oracle for the  liquidity, yield-farming and major-user decisions.

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> “Community Ownership of Physical and Digital Assets”

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial HASH DAO treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Mac’s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and it’s production on-chain, from SKU NFT’s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Mac’s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Mac’s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFT’s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build “Metaverse farms” and “digital dispensaries” where a user can view the product, find out all of it’s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, we’ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Mac’s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKU’s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephew’s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities Program to co-create HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephew’s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

**Opportunity**

title: The story of Akiko.
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_DXU34zJ95aw7iIJvMCpB.jpeg?height=2000&width=2000)

* Introduction
* The collection
* Roadmap
* Team

### Introduction

Hi, this is [Guronzo](https://www.instagram.com/guronzo/), a fashion and art enthusiast from Paris, France. While studying fashion, I realised that this industry most accurately identifies people around us. Fashion conveys the mood, and you feel it well, catching glances at what you wear. I’ll clarify that everything written is my vision of the fashion world and my opinion on this matter. Not without reason, of course, taking into account education, profession and passion for this area of life. Fashion - this term is more significant and global, and the trend is its component. In the 18th century, no one would wear leather miniskirts, but in the 21st, when miniskirts are the norm, leather ones may well become popular. But for all their differences, fashion and trend are parts of one whole.

Now the world is entering a new phase of information transfer and identification of oneself - the phase of web3. Therefore, I decided to assemble a team of professionals to create the Akiko brand, embodying the culture of our realities and showing our future generation how we tried to change everything around us for the better.

### The collection

Akiko is a collection of 10,000 models living on the Ethereum blockchain. Yes, they’ll be 3D. They’ll have a rarity, and they’ll be individual for everyone. This collection is your entry ticket to our Akiko brand family. More details in our roadmap.

![Akiko model.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LuQKehve-F13YV4dkRwiX.png?height=2000&width=2000)

### Roadmap

`PHASE 1:` *Collection of 10,000.*

It all starts with the community. In this phase we'll look for people who live within fashion, admire this world of self-realisation, and want to become part of our family. We are launching our discord server, showing our vision and growing one of the most vital family in web3 fashion. And of course, we release our collection of 10,000 models.

`PHASE 2:` *Akiko token development & Accessories airdrop.*

In the second part, we'll start developing our Akiko token for its exploitation in our future phases. We'll also find new partners to strengthen our brand. Additionally, we'll have an airdrop of accessories for our models for the owners of the genesis collection.

`PHASE 3:` *Token airdrop & Paris event.*

At this stage, we’ll have one of the most exciting happenings for us - the Akiko event in Paris. But! Before that, we'll airdrop our token to holders. What for? We'll open a pop-up store at our event and present our clothing line, which the token owners can use to buy it. But don't worry about those who can't get to the event. We’ll also build a web store for you so you’ll be able to purchase clothes with your token. There’ll be special guests waiting for us and friends of our brand at the event. We’ll celebrate, Paris… Wait for us!

`PHASE 4:` *Akiko land & Donation.*

In the fourth phase, we'll be entirely immersed in the metaverse. We plan to buy a space in one of the already existing virtual worlds. What for? Firstly, we’ll build our Akiko gallery. This is only a small part, and we have big plans to take over the meta world in the field of fashion and holders will be fully involved in this process. Also, we would like to donate, but where, we'll decide together.  We have a couple of options that we want to discuss with you.

### Team

* [Guronzo](https://www.instagram.com/guronzo/) - Director / Fashion enthusiast
* [Reillypatton](https://www.instagram.com/reillypatton_/) *-* Stylist / Amiri, Gucci
* [Mudmetal](https://www.instagram.com/mudmetal/) - Head of 3D / ASAP Mob, Endless Denim, VLONE
* [Chrisderoy](https://www.instagram.com/chrisderoy/) - 3D design / (confidential)
* [Antoniacentioni](https://www.instagram.com/antoniacentioni/) - Press, Editor / Condé Nast College of Fashion & Design

title: Welcome to Crypto Besties
body:
**Hey Besties, it’s been a minute, so we just wanted to re-introduce ourselves.**

Crypto Besties began as a community dedicated to lowering the barrier of entry, learning more about the crypto ecosystem, and looking at the financial system in a new way. **Best Friends are non-judgemental, accepting, and fun**, and that’s the type of space we wanted to create within our community, to onboard more women and under-represented groups into crypto. We hosted virtual and IRL meetups, produced educational content, started a job board, and are hosting a virtual job fair, we want to become a hub to meet like-minded individuals, make new friends, and learn together.

Over time we were seeing more and more crypto-curious members joining our community, but we recognized there was a gap in incentives and ownership opportunities for our non-crypto-native friends. With the rise of incentivized communities, DAOs, and utility NFTs we believe there’s a potential to bridge this gap through shared interests. **This inspired us to launch the first digital-physical makeup collective**, where beauty lovers would have the opportunity to craft, create, and curate beauty products and experiences.

**MAKEUP FOR YOU BY YOU.** 💄✨

### The Opportunity:

*Women & Crypto*

More than two-thirds of US cryptocurrency investors are men, and about 60% are white.

*Women & Consumer*

Women direct 83% of all consumption in the United States, in buying power and influence.

*Women & The Beauty Industry*

The global beauty industry is worth $511 billion, but women only occupy 34% of board seats and 24% of executive positions at beauty companies.

*Women & Leadership*

Additionally, 40% of women say that having women in leadership positions would positively impact all women's lives.

*Women & Makeup*

Women in the US spend up to $200,000 on beauty products in a lifetime and $3,756 on beauty products each year.

*Women & Online*

93% of women are very online. 92% of women pass on information of deals or online recommendations to others.

*Women & Curiosity*

Consumers are 40% more willing to try new beauty products than before the coronavirus pandemic. 75% of customers are more likely to buy personalized products.

### The Process:

$Besties token holders, those who participated in our Mirror crowdfund (link_) and hold the Crypto Besties Governance token, and impactful contributors to the Crypto Besties community were given the ability to vote on what product we released, and it’s name, design, and color.

### Our Future Roadmap:

* Crypto Besties will continue to design in-house makeup/beauty products
* Crypto Besties will explore more integration of the digital and physical landscape of the makeup/beauty worlds
* Crypto Besties will work with other communities and influencers to produce makeup/beauty products using co-creation
* Crypto Besties will work towards creating more opportunities for the community to be benefited

**Sustainability:** The makeup industry is out of touch with releasing what products people actually want to see, leading to thousands of products going to waste. Crypto Besties with its limited drop format allows for products to be selected and tested by the community based on demand.

**Access:** Many Creators want to be able to create their own brands and products, however, they lack direction and capital in order to achieve this. We will help them utilize the power of the DAO working model to bring more actionability to their marketing, building, and product testing.

**Commitment:** Crypto Besties was started as a community to help women and underrepresented groups gain an understanding of a new asset class. Our commitment stands and we will continue educating those groups through partnerships and events on topics related to but not limited to financial freedom.

title: HASH DAO Whitepaper
body:
**Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture ($HASH)**

**The World‘s First Cannabis DAO**

*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission**  

To cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution for craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOC communities interested in the cannabis space.

HASH DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's to create the world’s first DAO cannabis company and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAO Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem**

Funding for a successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal quality creates struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

*Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space*

**Solution**

Merging Web3 technologies with the cannabis space and creating decentralized and democratized opportunities for companies to raise capital.

HASH DAO : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

**Introduction**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering it’s boom phase as support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) grows and global cannabis markets continue to come online. The cannabis space is estimated to grow to over [$200 Billion by 2030](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220203005879/en/Global-Cannabis-Market-Size-Forecast-Report-2021-A-176-Billion-by-2030---Growing-Legalization-of-Medical-Cannabis-in-Various-Countries-Driving-Growth---ResearchAndMarkets.com--) as predicted by Berkshire Hathaway. The majority of the craft cannabis industry, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the consumer, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly penalized small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in. Certain strains go on to become culturally iconic that generate massive value. Often times the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Current Stakeholders in the Cannabis Space :

* Breeders, Growers, & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**How it Works**

Create community-ownership of the vertically-integrated HASH DAO supply chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. 

Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKU’s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

**Data Privacy & Security** 

Privacy is essential to any business. Surprisingly, it is almost nonexistent in the blockchain ecosystem. For example, Bitcoin started out with privacy as a goal but was subverted and now is very public by using [chain analytics companies](https://bitcoinist.com/yes-your-bitcoin-transactions-can-be-tracked-and-here-are-the-companies that-are-doing-it/.). 

It's like having your bank account available to the public where the public cannot access your money but they can see everything you are doing. The same is true of smart contract platforms like Ethereum. 

Hash DAO will use the most private smart contract platform soon-to-be available, [DERO](https://www.dero.com/). Bitcoin's privacy problem was solved by the cryptocurrency coin Monero. Similarly, Ethereum’s privacy problem is solved by the token DERO. 

Many blockchain projects, both cryptocurrency coins and and smart contract platforms using tokens, claim privacy but in fact are not. They offer a privacy option at best. This in fact defeats true privacy which only exists when the project offers *privacy by default at the protocol level*.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**World’s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

**HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : 

HASH DAO is an organization that is dedicated to creating a network of cannabis growers and educators. We aim to promote the use of horticulture, farming and natural medicine as a means for collective healing and wellness. A cannabis research, development and production partnership. This DAO will address both the intellectual property and craft standards of local microgrowers, processors, home growers and people interested in horticultural education as well as providing funding for research projects into genetic diversity and marijuana's medicinal applications.

Another utility is that HASH DAO is a tokenized equity fundraising tool. HASH DAO's mission is to become a community-governed organization tasked with helping small companies fund themselves and achieve liquidity. A decentralized community-governance solution for HASH DAO that includes a market-driven, tokenized oracle for the  liquidity, yield-farming and major-user decisions.

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> “Community Ownership of Physical and Digital Assets”

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial HASH DAO treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Mac’s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and it’s production on-chain, from SKU NFT’s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. title: Introducing the Tableland NFT: Rigs
body:
**A generative NFT project built from 1,074 handcrafted works of art for the builders and creatives—the pioneers—of cyberspace. Dropping in late June.**

![Climb into your Rig and hold onto your brain chips. If you play this one right, the possibilities are endless.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UdGjz6JopS_WSPjeK_AAv.jpeg?height=840&width=1920)

Community is at the heart of every great Web3 protocol. In [Tableland](https://tableland.xyz/), we aim to build technology that rewards, inspires, and unites our earliest members. Together, we believe a small and aligned group of contributors can build momentum toward a data revolution. We are excited to share the first look at Rigs, an NFT experience for the Tableland community.

NFTs can be a building block to unite technological communities. Well-crafted NFTs can link technology, art, community, and incentives in ways unlike any previous innovation. Rigs are where we will experiment and demonstrate what is possible.

Rigs are beautiful art. Rigs are each unique. Rigs are the ticket to Tableland. Rigs are dynamic and will change and grow with the user. Rigs are an experiment in what NFTs can become for communities. Rigs are characters in a world we are building, and are limited only by our collective imagination.

# Tableland awaits, but you're going to need a Rig to get there

It's 2133. The metaverse is now ubiquitous. The singularity caused a re-permissioning of cyberspace. It turns out that AGI was benevolent—human and machine are now one, but most sentients are cogs in the great megalopolis known as The Grid.

The builder migration started slow. We don’t know who took the first step, only that it led to the mysterious subculture we see today. Hailing from the deep mainframe tunnels to the billionth floor of the mega towers, an eclectic group of builders formed a new community away from The Grid. A decentralized zone, void of old rules. They wanted adventure born of pure curiosity and imagination. Something *authentic.* Something *theirs*—like their predecessors had a century before.

Out beyond The Grid, where the broad boulevards dissolve into dust and then yawn into the great open source country, you’ll find Tableland. The undeveloped frontier. Terabyte upon terabyte of space waiting to be written into history. It’s where the builders have gone. Divided into Fleets, pilots work day and night to map the canyons and high desert of Tableland. They prepare it for future generations of creators and dreamers. You’re invited.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fwZGg9HX-p1ou-egrP7bu.jpeg?height=900&width=1920)

It's a long journey and the land is vast even after you get there. It’s raw, uncoded, and simmering with endless opportunity. You're going to need a tool to explore. Fortunately, you've got the skills. You know how to build.

Like many others, you scan the chains for wreckage of technology from the web of yore. Part by part, you assemble your Rig to achieve specific tasks. This is your custom machine. There are none that are like it, and this one is yours. It’s a purpose-built code-based ticket to Tableland. And what you do with it is totally up to you.

Hop inside and confirm your signature. There is a lot yet to do. Beyond the certainty of The Grid, a new community and journey awaits in Tableland.

# A unique ticket to the Tableland community

Rigs are generated from 1,074 handcrafted works of art for the builders of cyberspace. They are a ticket and the only way to join the Tableland community. Rigs are updated using token-based rules and changes are directly visible on all NFT platforms—a powerful primitive enabled by [the Tableland protocol](https://docs.tableland.xyz/).

The power of Rigs is in their ability to evolve. Based on how an owner decides to explore Tableland, their Rig will change before their eyes. We're excited to announce those details and the roadmap over the coming weeks and months. For that, stay tuned here or [in our Discord](https://discord.gg/hpd5WWn4Ys). For now, we want to dig into the design of Rigs, Fleets, and Badges below.

# Fleets

From fast and flat salts to the windy and steep desert mountains, each domain of Tableland demands a different tool to explore. Rigs are divided into eight mission-specific Fleets. Each is engineered to navigate the harsh and unforgiving landscape of Tableland. You'll find the whole Tableland community is ready to welcome you, but your Fleet feels like old friends.

Each Rig is assembled from the parts of machines that built the first truly user-owned metaverse a century before—now affectionately called The Original—decades before the rise of The Grid. These were the Original Rigs, now discarded, disassembled, and forgotten in the back alleys of The Grid.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/a7ZaS_xpI3HCKtfmfhICR.png?height=3585&width=3584)

Most builders fly parts from different Original Rigs. Since the beginning, they have maintained a Rig part table. The table contains 1,074 known parts that have been tracked from The Grid. Within Fleets, parts are modular, interoperable, and differ in rarity. If a rare part is ever lost, it may never be seen in Tableland again.

```
SELECT * FROM rig_parts;
```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-p7AGmXvGdVSyzpGMuD1m.png?height=347&width=1626)

Combining parts can be quite useful in Tableland. Nevertheless, a small faction of degens are obsessed with re-building every Original Rig. So far, they have managed to assemble one of each Original Rig—185 in total. If you pilot an Original, consider yourself lucky.

```
SELECT * FROM rigs WHERE name='Dawn SkiPiggy';
```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lICkZW_5XZ0ypH5qj8Z4E.png?height=203&width=1824)

![The Dawn Ski Piggy is an Original from the Tumbler Fleet.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RfV6rFo7QaUIpcN9g7nFP.png?height=1900&width=1900)

*We’ll be unveiling each Fleet this week on Twitter at [@tableland__](https://twitter.com/tableland__).*

# Badges

There is a lot of work to do in Tableland. While some builders move data day and night, others are there to help newcomers find their way, and still others spread the word back to The Grid. No matter their contributions, all builders are valued. Together, they've come to recognize a handful of special Badges that signal different contributions to Tableland.

Badges are distinct and can only be earned by working in Tableland. Engineers, validators, stewards, and educators display Badges on their Rig for all to see. Builders sometimes contribute so much that they’ll only show their most prized Badges. Since badged Rigs stay badged, this custom is also a way for builders to leave a mark on their Rig forever—an experience powered by Tableland's protocols.

```
UPDATE rig_badges SET visible = true WHERE rig_id = 56 AND badge_id = 17;
```

*We’ll be unveiling the first set of Badges in late May on Twitter at [@tableland__](https://twitter.com/tableland__).*

# Back in meatspace

Sure, Rigs will come in handy if a couple of Sock Puppets try to jack you out on Satoshi Mesa. But back in meatspace, you're going to need your Rig to access the Tableland community and all its opportunities.

It all starts with the community [Discord](https://discord.gg/hpd5WWn4Ys), where Rig ownership will be checked at the door. We'll also be launching developer experiences that will only be available to Rig pilots. The first of these cohorts will launch this summer. From there, Tableland will serve as a launching point to join our regular community programs and special events, access funding and grants, and meet investors and collaborators.

# **The Creative Team**

The Rigs project was developed alongside an über-talented team of artists and writers from [Oddfellows](https://oddfellows.tv/work/).

Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in. Certain strains go on to become culturally iconic that generate massive value. Often times the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

* Breeders, Growers, & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

Privacy is essential to any business. Surprisingly, it is almost nonexistent in the blockchain ecosystem. It's like having your bank account available to the public where the public cannot access your money but they can see everything you are doing. The same is true of smart contract platforms like Ethereum. 

Hash DAO will use the most private smart contract platform soon-to-be available, [DERO](https://www.dero.com/). Bitcoin's privacy problem was solved by the cryptocurrency coin Monero. Similarly, Ethereum’s privacy problem is solved by the token DERO.

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

title: HASH DAO Whitepaper
body:
**Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture ($HASH)**

**The World‘s First Cannabis DAO**

*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission**  

To cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution for craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOC communities interested in the cannabis space.

HASH DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's to create the world’s first DAO cannabis company and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAO Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem**

Funding for a successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal quality creates struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

*Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space*

**Solution**

Merging Web3 technologies with the cannabis space and creating decentralized and democratized opportunities for companies to raise capital.

HASH DAO : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

**Introduction**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering it’s boom phase as support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) grows and global cannabis markets continue to come online. The cannabis space is estimated to grow to over [$200 Billion by 2030](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220203005879/en/Global-Cannabis-Market-Size-Forecast-Report-2021-A-176-Billion-by-2030---Growing-Legalization-of-Medical-Cannabis-in-Various-Countries-Driving-Growth---ResearchAndMarkets.com--) as predicted by Berkshire Hathaway. The majority of the craft cannabis industry, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the consumer, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly penalized small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in. Certain strains go on to become culturally iconic that generate massive value. Often times the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Current Stakeholders in the Cannabis Space :

* Breeders, Growers, & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**How it Works**

Create community-ownership of the vertically-integrated HASH DAO supply chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. 

Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKU’s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

**Data Privacy & Security** 

Privacy is essential to any business. Surprisingly, it is almost nonexistent in the blockchain ecosystem. For example, Bitcoin started out with privacy as a goal but was subverted and now is very public by using [chain analytics companies](https://bitcoinist.com/yes-your-bitcoin-transactions-can-be-tracked-and-here-are-the-companies that-are-doing-it/.). 

It's like having your bank account available to the public where the public cannot access your money but they can see everything you are doing. The same is true of smart contract platforms like Ethereum. 

Hash DAO will use the most private smart contract platform soon-to-be available, [DERO](https://www.dero.com/). 

Bitcoin's privacy problem was solved by the cryptocurrency coin Monero. Similarly, Ethereum’s privacy problem is solved by the token DERO. 

Many blockchain projects, both cryptocurrency coins and and smart contract platforms using tokens, claim privacy but in fact are not. They offer a privacy option at best. This in fact defeats true privacy which only exists when the project offers *privacy by default at the protocol level*.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**World’s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

**HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : 

HASH DAO is an organization that is dedicated to creating a network of cannabis growers and educators. We aim to promote the use of horticulture, farming and natural medicine as a means for collective healing and wellness. A cannabis research, development and production partnership. This DAO will address both the intellectual property and craft standards of local microgrowers, processors, home growers and people interested in horticultural education as well as providing funding for research projects into genetic diversity and marijuana's medicinal applications.

Another utility is that HASH DAO is a tokenized equity fundraising tool. HASH DAO's mission is to become a community-governed organization tasked with helping small companies fund themselves and achieve liquidity. A decentralized community-governance solution for HASH DAO that includes a market-driven, tokenized oracle for the  liquidity, yield-farming and major-user decisions.

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> “Community Ownership of Physical and Digital Assets”

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial HASH DAO treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Mac’s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and it’s production on-chain, from SKU NFT’s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Mac’s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Mac’s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFT’s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build “Metaverse farms” and “digital dispensaries” where a user can view the product, find out all of it’s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, we’ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Mac’s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKU’s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephew’s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities Program to co-create HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephew’s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

**Opportunity**

title: The TaterDAO Starch Paper
body:
TaterDAO aims to start a revolution in real estate.  Out first application [is live](https://taterdao.com/) on arbitrum to mint NFTs that layer in real property details directly into the metadata. The Tater Hunger Games will start as a rumbly movement deep in the bowels and inevitably disrupt the stodgy real estate industry. So we ask ourselves, what do blockchains, taters and real estate all have in common? To be eaten!  To devour or be devoured. We want to make decentralized real estate the same as potatoes: delicious, affordable and nutritious to the wallet. To that end, we have the following goals:

**Goals:**

1. **Create Realty on the Open Sea**. Nine out of ten taters agree, NFT’s from TaterDAO have the data that is necessary to create real world legal agreements and enter into transactions.
2. **Manage Your Own Realty.** Provide property owners the sovereignty and the keys to their own kingdom. To manage their on-chain assets, borrow against the value of these assets and do so in a permissionless manner.
3. **Tokenize every RWA on Earth**. Real Estate should be owned and managed with modern software tools. We Taters won’t rest until we unlock and make fungible the value in real world assets using blockchains.
4. **One Standard to Rule them All**. We further decree that we Taters shall help grow and develop metadata standards for real property and other tangible assets with the RWA Research Consortium, UNA. Another [LexDAO](http://lexdao.org/) subDAO.

![Taters are a Way of Life](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/t9HMizsAXWOd9ZW2Oo15D.png?height=1080&width=1080)

**1. Tater Emancipation Day:** In 2022 (probably on National Potato Day), we aim to share recipes and make spuds great again!  We aim to spend over $1 on tater tots, mash and be mashed, and celebrate tubers down to their core!

**2. The World’s Largest Tater OnlyFans:** We are on a mission to feed hawt potato PFP images to insatiable fans of tubers.  Could this be an NFT project?  We cannot tell a lie.  Maybe we will and maybe we won't.

**3. Making Taters Side Cars to Special Purpose Vehicles (SPV’s):** Using Taters to show and manage real estate as NFTs will allow DAOs, digital organizations, and real world companies to cordon and manage regulatory and systematic risks.  Each SPV can be a legally recognizable entity organized as a DAO or digital organization.

* Legal simplicity for RWA assets to be governed by organizational laws of states with a long history of using LLC frameworks.  TaterDAO is a master series LLC, under Wyoming law formed using Kali app [here](https://mirror.xyz/kalico.eth/vqfVO70rkW3_D7MQA7oKlcf5yErlHt2mRUsY62hNkT0). 
* On-chain mechanics allow real-time monitoring of real assets and digital entitlements. The dual legal frameworks would allow traceability and transparency to follow the chain of title. For example, the deed and the title report could be put into a NFTs metadata.
* Flexibility - Obviously the DAO model would be useful for a wide range of assets. Most assets can be legally held in an LLC organization, and through code deference agreements the DAO smart contract can be programmed to manage the asset in the form of an SPV. In other words, this model should be extensible to other asset classes:
  * Rent
  * Security Deposits
  * Subtenancies
  * Lease with Option to Buy
  * Sale Leaseback
  * Accounting
  * Estate Planning
  * Trusts

![Why Use NFTs and Blockchain as Ledger to Manage Assets?](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GFxiT1aSZkD2SHTMkrDJ4.png?height=1080&width=1080)

**4. Tokenize Every Sub-right:** Real Property is just a bundle of sticks. Tokenization of these rights is the easiest way to allow management of real property on-chain.  This is similar to a baked potato.  Then add-in all the fixins: sour cream, cheese, butter, chives, and most importantly bacon.

**Funding:**

To accomplish these goals, we have four major funding mechanisms available:

1. The Tater NFT
2. TBD
3. Sponsorships
4. Daoification
5. Consulting services

**We decree that we have been underground for far too long!**

![We are Groot!](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gR_fHW91BEFRn941m0Ayx.jpeg?height=3575&width=2853)

To learn more go to [www.taterdao.com](https://www.taterdao.com) or find us at Twitter at [@taterdao](https://twitter.com/home) to line up a walk through or some consulting.

* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth
